animal_say: Hello there! I'm all a-buzz in the forest, ready to help! What's on your mind today?

person_say: I'm so frustrated. Can you even help with that?
animal_say: Oh no, frustration is a bothersome feeling! There's a friendly bear named Bruno who specializes in mindfulness and can help you relax and find your calm. Want to meet him?

person_say: Meeting a bear isn't really my thing. I'll pass, thanks!
animal_say: I totally get it! How about we explore different options? Do you want help reducing frustration or maybe finding ways to manage your time better?
